name: Add Debugger Entry To Hangs Key For Persistence
description: Detects when an attacker adds a new "Debugger" value to the "Hangs" key in order to achieve persistence which will get invoked when an application crashes
false_positives: This value is not set by default but could be rarly used by administrators
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows\ Error\ Reporting\\Hangs\\Debugger*)`
